akas: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (original title)
Confessions of a Sinful Nun USA
akas from release info: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (original title)
Confessions of a Sinful Nun USA

1.title: Sister Penny and Sister Darcie are missing

episode of.title: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (TV Mini-Series 2017)

1.plot: While troubled by her sinful thoughts for beautiful new arrival, Lily, Sister Charlotte is tasked to find missing nuns, Sister Penny and Sister Darcie. When she stumbles upon the two sisters giving into the temptation of another woman, their sins of the flesh now challenge Charlotte's fate even more. Will her attraction shatter everything she believes in?

2.title: God don't let me succumb to the temptation

episode of.title: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (TV Mini-Series 2017)

2.plot: The temptation for Lily grows deeper for Sister Charlotte. It's more and more difficult to hide her lust for the younger girl. Mother Superior and Sister Mona are getting suspicious. The two scheming nuns decide to test the purity of Sister Charlotte. Will she be able to resist the ultimate temptation?

3.title: Sister Riley discovers true Love

episode of.title: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (TV Mini-Series 2017)

3.plot: During her cleaning duties Sister Charlotte is interrupted by Sister Riley. She has noticed Charlotte struggling between her faith and her desire for Lily. Hoping to ease Charlotte's conscience Sister Riley shares her own passionate encounter with Sister Lea, where Riley was introduced to the deep pleasure of another woman.

4.title: Beg God for Forgiveness

episode of.title: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (TV Mini-Series 2017)

4.plot: Sister Mona catches Sister Charlotte and Sister Riley talking about pleasuring another women. Furious, Sister Mona throws Sister Charlotte out of the room so she can punish Riley for her sinful ways. Scared for her sister, Charlotte gets the only nun who can save Sister Riley-- Mother Superior. They re-enter the room to find Sister Mona whipping Sister Riley. Mother Superior orders Sister Mona to stop, sending Sister Charlotte and Sister Riley out of the room. Now the two nuns are alone. Finally, Sister Mona gets the attention of Mother Superior and she will make sure...

5.title: Sister Charlotte's fate

episode of.title: Confessions of a Sinful Nun (TV Mini-Series 2017)

5.plot: The chaos has finally ended with Sister Mona being transferred to another convent and Lily leaving unexpectedly before her first vows. As for Sister Charlotte - everything has gone back to normal. Of course, sometimes she thinks about Lily, and she dreams about her, but nothing ever happened between them. Until she receives an unexpected visitor and all of the confessions may not be enough to stop her ultimate desire.

imdb.plot outline: 'Confession Of A Sinful Nun' follows devout Sister Charlotte as she lives a peaceful life with her other sisters. Unfortunately, everything will change when Lily arrived to the convent. Sister Charlotte is suddenly seduced by the temptation of another woman. This attraction will shatter everything she believes in. Meanwhile, Mother Superior will have to deal with other forbidden behavior around the convent.
